subject: Medicine
title: What Is a Drug
description: A fast breakdown of What Is a Drug for builders.

hook.text: Coffee, aspirin, and chemotherapy are all drugs. The definition is simpler than you think.

buildup.text: A drug is any chemical substance that changes how the body or mind functions when introduced.

discovery.text: Drugs can heal, harm, or bothâ€”the difference is often just the dose and the context.

twist.text: Water can be toxic at extreme doses. Arsenic was once used as medicine. Context defines the drug.

climax.text: Pharmacology studies how drugs interact with the bodyâ€”understanding the science behind every pill you take.

punchline.text: Every medicine is a chemical. Every chemical has rules.

quiz.question: What defines a substance as a drug?
options: Any chemical that changes how the body or mind functions
